title: my screen keeps on freezing help me guys
body: after the update on microsoft my computer keeps on freezing by the start of the game and i had leaverbuster lost lp riot pls fix this

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot remove Leaverbuster penalties. Regardless of the reason you disconnect from a match, it still negatively impacts everyone in the match. Because of this, all disconnections are treated equally.

Your issue is likely caused by the Game DVR feature inside the Xbox app that was enabled by the recent Anniversary update in Windows 10. As a quick check, I recommend [disabling the Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the freezing.

Let me know if this helped.
